changeSet.author: Ahmed B
changeSet.sql: create table if not exists report ( id int8 not null, user_id int8 not null, start_date timestamp, end_date timestamp, client_id int8, report_type int4, request_date timestamp, generated_date timestamp, expire_date timestamp, report_status int4, off_set varchar(255), is_deleted boolean default false not null, createdBy varchar(255), createdDate timestamp, lastModifiedBy varchar(255), modifiedDate timestamp, primary key (id) );
